story:
German - Français - English - Tükçe

Information - Bilgiler - Informations : www.kaypakkaya.de

This campaign wants to finance a reprint of the selected works Ibrahim Kaypakkaya's and aims at printing and publishing them in book form.
In order to print the book, we require financial support.
This is a non-profit-campaign. All of the proceeds from the sale of the book will be donated to political prisoners in Turkey.

Ausgewählte Werke Ibrahim Kaypakkaya

Gründer der Türkischen kommunistischen Partei / Marxistisch-Leninistisch und der Volksbefreiungsarmee TIKKO

Diese Kampagne hat zum Ziel, eine Neuauflage der Werke Ibrahim Kaypakkayas zu finanzieren und diese in Buchform zu drucken und zu publizieren.

Damit das Buch in Druck gegeben werden kann, benötigen wir finanzielle Hilfe. 

Dies ist eine Non-Profit-Kampagne. Der Erlös aus dem Verkauf des Buches wird gespendet und kommt in vollem Umfang politischen Gefangenen in der Türkei zugute.

Hintergrundinformationen

Gründer der Türkischen kommunistischen Partei / Marxistisch-Leninistisch und der Volksbefreiungsarmee TIKKO

Ibrahim Kaypakkaya gehörte zu den führenden Persönlichkeiten der revolutionären Bewegung in der Türkei an und markierte mit seinen Theorien einen Wandel in der revolutionären Bewegung. Im Gegensatz zu anderen 68´ern Revolutionären wie Deniz Gezmis oder Mahir Cayhan  unterschied er sich mit seiner Ablehnung der Staatsideologie des Kemalismus und der Deklaration dieser als Faschismus von vielen anderen der revolutionären Bewegung. Auch war er derjenige, der umfassend auf die Situation der kurdischen Bevölkerung einging und dafür plädierte, ihnen ihr Selbstbestimmungsrecht zuzugestehen. Seine Thesen und Werke gehen detailliert auf revolutionäre Fragestellungen ein und erarbeiten diese ausführlich. Dem türkischen Staat waren und sind seine Ansichten ein Dorn im Auge und man fürchtete sich vor einer Verbreitung dieser, weswegen man ihn, nachdem man ihn inhaftierte, nach langer und kaltblütiger Folter, umbrachte. Die CIA klassifizierte die Thesen des gerade einmal 24 jährigen Kaypakkayas als die politisch gefährlichsten Thesen in der Türkei.  Seine Schriften sind in der Türkei verboten und Personen, die diese verbreiten, müssen mit drakonischen Sanktionen, fast ausschließlich Haftstrafen, rechnen. Es gestaltet sich somit schwierig, seine Werke einer breiten Öffentlichkeit zugänglich zu machen. Mit dem vorliegenden Werk bietet sich uns nun die Möglichkeit, seine Werke in deutscher Sprache zu publizieren. Dazu benötigen wir jedoch finanzielle Hilfe, die wir dazu nutzen wollen, das Buch drucken zu lassen.

Inhalt und Gliederung des Buches:

  1. Kritik am Program der TIIKP

  2. Allgemeine Kritik am Safak-Revisionismus

  3. Ansichten über den Kemalismus 

  4. Die Nationale Frage in der Türkei (Kurdenfrage)

Infos, Zahlen, Fakten

Das Buch soll  zuerst auf Deutsch und im Anschluss auf Französisch übersetzt und gedruckt werden. Die erste Auflage ( Deutsch / Französisch) beträgt 500 Exemplare. Die zweite Auflage wird bei Bedarf erneut mit 500 Exemplaren gedruckt. Verkauf des Buches wird online (www.kaypakkaya.de) sowie im Direktvertrieb erfolgen. 

Gedruckt soll in A5 Format, Soft Cover - Umschlag  farbig, 90gr Papier s/w

Ziel ist es das Buch (vorerst auf Deutsch)  bis Mitte Mai 2015 zu drucken und herauszugeben. Die französische Version folgt danach. 

Bei weiteren Fragen, Anregungen, Bestellungen u.ä. stehen wir Ihnen gerne zur Verfügung. Kontakt: info@kaypakkaya.de - www.kaypakkaya.de

Unterstützen ohne zu Spenden

Nicht jeder kann etwas spenden. Dennoch kann jeder das Projekt unterstützen, Indem ihr unser Projekt verbreitet via Facebook, Twitter, Email etc. ermöglicht ihr, dass ein breites Publikum erreicht werden kann. 

-----------

Ibrahim Kaypakkaya - Œuvres choisies

Cette campagne servira a financer la réimpression des œuvres choisies de Ibrahim Kaypakkaya dans le but de les imprimer et de les publier sous forme de livre.
Pour imprimer ce livre, nous avons besoin d’un soutien financier.
Cette campagne n’est pas lucrative. Tous les revenus de la vente de ce livre seront envoyés aux prisonniers politiques en Turquie.

Informations de fond

Fondateur du Parti Communiste Turc / Marxiste-Léniniste et de l’

Armée Ouvrière et Paysanne de Libération de la Turquie TIKKO.

Ibrahim Kaypakkaya a fait parti des leaders du mouvement révolutionnaire en Turquie et a marqué un changement dans le mouvement avec ses théories.
En contraste avec les autres révolutionnaire en 68 comme Deniz Gezmis ou Mahir Cayan, il s’est distingué des autres révolutionnaires en rejetant l’idéologie d’état – le kémalisme, en le déclarant comme étant fasciste. 
Il s’est également distingué en parlant de la situation des kurdes et à parler en faveur de leur droit à l’auto-détermination.
Ses thèses et ses œuvres parlent et élaborent les problématiques révolutionnaires.
Ses prises de positions politiques étés et sont toujours considéré comme dangereuses par l’Etat Turc qui en avait peur. Ibrahim Kaypakkaya a donc été arrêté et longtemps torturé de sang-froid jusqu’à la mort. 
La CIA considère les thèses de Kaypakkaya (qui avait que 24 ans) comme les thèses politiques les plus dangereuses de Turquie et de Moyen Orient.
Ses écrits sont interdits et les personnes qui les diffusent font face à des condamnations draconiennes, souvent des emprisonnements à vie. 

Il est par conséquent très dur de rendre ses écrits disponibles à un large public. Ce projet est une chance pour publier ses œuvres en langue allemande. Mais pour le faire, nous avons besoin d’un soutien financier qui nous servira à imprimer ce livre.

Contenu
1. Critique du Programme du TIIKP
2. Critique Générale du Révisionnisme de Safak
3. Sur le Kémalisme
4. La Question Nationale en Turquie (Le Problème Kurde)

Nombre et Faits

En premier le livre sera traduit en allemand, puis une traduction française suivra. La première édition du livre (Allemand/Français) sera tirée à 500 exemplaires. Apres épuisement, une autre édition sera également tirée à 500 exemplaires.
Le livre sera venu en ligne et en vente directe.
Le format du livre sera : A5, couverture souple en couleur, papier 90g b/w
L’objectif est d’imprimer et de publier ce livre (Allemand) avant mai 2015.

Pour plus d’informations, suggestion, commande etc. veuillez contacter l’adresse suivant : info@kaypakkaya.de - www.kaypakkaya.de

Aide sans don

Tout le monde n’a pas les possibilités de donner. Mais votre aide serait appréciée si vous soutenez le projet en le diffusant sur Facebook, Twitter, par mails etc. Cela permettrait d’atteindre un publique plus large.

Ibrahim Kaypakkaya - Selected Works

This campaign wants to finance a reprint of the selected works Ibrahim Kaypakkaya's and aims at printing and publishing them in book form.
For printing the book, we require financial support.
This is a non-profit-campaign. All of the proceeds from the sale of the book will be donated to political prisoners in Turkey.

--------------------

Background Information about Ibrahim Kaypakkaya

Founder of the Turkish Communist Party/Marxist-Leninist and of the People's Liberation Army TIKKO.

Ibrahim Kaypakka was part of the leading personalities of  the revolutionary movement in Turkey and marked a change in the movement with his theories.  In contrast to other 68 revolutionaries like Deniz Gezmis and Mahir Cayan, he distinguished himself from many other revolutionaries by rejecting the state ideology of Kemalism and declaring it as fascism. He was also the one who referred to the situation of the Kurdish population and spoke up for their right to self-determination.
His theses and works focuse in detail on revolutionary questions and elaborate them.
His political views were and still are considered dangerous by the Turkish state and therefore their distribution is feared. So Ibrahim Kaypakakkaya was arrested and tortured to death after a long period of coldblooded torture.
The CIA classifies the theses of the only 24 year old Kaypakkaya as the politically most dangerous theses in Turkey and the Middle East.
His writings are banned and persons, who do distribute them, are going to face draconian penalties, almost exclusively long-term-imprisonment.

So it's very difficult to make his writings accesible to a broad public. The present project now gives us the chance to publish his writings in German language. But for achieving this, we need financial support, which we want to use to print this book.

Content

1. Criticism of the TIIKP's Programm 
2. General Criticism of the Safak-Revisionism
3. Views on Kemalism
4. The National Question in Turkey (The Kurdish Issue)

Information, Numbers and Facts

At first the book will be translated into German and will be followed by its French translation. The first edition of the book (German/French) will consist of 500 copies. When needed, the second edition will also be printed with 500 copies.
The book will be sold online (www.kaypakkaya.de) and via direct sales.

The book format is: A5, coloured soft-cover, 90gr paper b/w

The aim is to print and to publish the book (german version)  until May 2015. The french version will be translated and printed as soon as possible. 

For further questions, suggestions, orders etc. please contact the following: info@kaypakkaya.de - www.kaypakkaya.de

Support Without Donation
Not everybody is able to donate. But we would be pleased if each of you could support the project by spreading it via Facebook, Twitter, E-Mail etc. So you will enable us to reach a broader public

----------------

Ibrahim Kaypakkaya – Seçme Yazılar

Bu kampanyanın hedefi, İbrahim Kaypakkaya’nın seçme yazılarının başka dillere çevirilmesi ve kitap olarak basılması. Bu hedefe ulasmak için ekonomik yardıma ihtiyacımız var. Kitap satışlarından elde edilecek gelirin tamamı Türkiye’deki siyasi tutsaklar için bağışlanacaktır.
Kitabın Almanca tercümesi Mayıs 2015'de basılıp, ardından Fransızca çevirisinin çalışmalarına start verilecektir.

Genel Bilgiler

İbrahim Kaypakkaya, Türkiye Komünist Partisi/Marksist-Leninist ve Türkiye Işçi Köylü Kurtuluş Ordusu TIKKO’nun kurucusudur.

Ibrahim Kaypakkaya Türkiye devrimci hareketinin önder kişiliklerinden biri olarak tarihe geçmiş ve teorileri ile devrimci hareket içinde hüküm süren paradigmanın başka bir yöne evrilmesini saglamıştır. Onu 68 kuşagının diğer devrimci önderleri Mahir Cayan ve Deniz Gezmiş’ten ayırt eden en belirgin nokta, Kemalizm hakkında olan görüşleridir. Devrimci hareketin birçok mensubuna karsın, “Kemalizm faşizmdir” diyerek Kemalist devlet ideolojisini faşizm olarak tanımlayan Kaypakkaya, Kürt halkının kendi kaderini tayin etme hakkını savunmuş ve bu konu hakkında kapsamlı analizlerde bulunmuştur.

Ibrahim Kaypakkaya’nın tezleri ve yazıları detaylı bir sekilde devrimci sorunlara değinip bunların çözümünü amaçlıyor.

Türkiye Devleti Kaypakkaya’nın görüşlerini tehlikeli olarak gördüğü ve bunların yayılmasından korktuğu için, onu uzun süren ağır bir iskenceden sonra katletmiştir. Hatta Amerikan istihbarat örgütü CIA 24 yaşındaki Kaypakkaya’nın tezlerini Türkiye’nin politik açıdan en tehlikeli tezleri olarak tanımlandırmıştır. Yazıları bundan dolayı yasaklanmıştır ve onların yayılmasına yardımcı olan kişiler hala ağır cezalar ile karşı karşıya kalıyorlar, çoğu zaman uzun hapishane süreçleri.

Bundan dolayı, Ibrahim Kaypakkaya’nın yazılarını geniş bir kitleye ulaştırmak oldukça zor bir hale geliyor. Bu proje ile amaçladığımız hedef ise, onun yazılarını Almanca ve Fransızca dillerinde kitap halinde basıp, görüşlerinin daha çok insan tarafından bilinmesini sağlamak.

Sayılar ve Notlar

Kitabin ilk basımı Almanca olacak ve ardından Fransızcaya çevirilip basılacaktır. Birinci basım (Almanca, Fransızca) 500 adetten oluşacaktır. Ikinci bir basıma ihtiyaç duyulduğunda, tekrar  500 adet basılacaktır. Kitabı internet aracılığı ile (www.kaypakkaya.de ) ve birebir gerçekleşecek satışlar ile satışa çıkarmayı düşünüyoruz.

Kitap A5 formatında basılacaktır. Amacımız, kitabı (öncelikle Almanca versiyonunu) Mayıs 2015’in ortasına kadar basıp yayımlamak. Fransızcası ardından yayımlanacak.

Sorularınız varsa, görüş beyan etmek veya sipariş vermek istiyorsanız, bize bu adreslerden ulaşabilirsiniz: info@kaypakkaya.de - www.kaypakkaya.de

Bağış Yapmadan Destek Olabilirsiniz

Tabii ki herkes bağış yapacak güce sahip degil. Ancak hepimiz bu projeye destek olabiriz. Facebook, Twitter, E-Mail vs. yardımıyla bu projenin daha geniş bir kitleye ulaşmasını saglayabiliriz. Bu konuda bize yardımcı olmanız, bizi projenin başarılı olabilmesi açısından sevindirecektir.

Ziel ist es das Buch (vorerst auf Deutsch)  bis Mitte Mai 2015 zu drucken und herauszugeben. Die französische Version folgt danach. 
Bei
weiteren Fragen, Anregungen, Bestellungen u.ä. stehen wir Ihnen
gerne zur Verfügung. Kontakt: info@kaypakkaya.de
- www.kaypakkaya.de
Unterstützen
ohne zu Spenden
Nicht jeder kann etwas
spenden. Dennoch kann jeder das Projekt unterstützen, Indem ihr
unser Projekt verbreitet via Facebook, Twitter, Email etc. ermöglicht
ihr, dass ein breites Publikum erreicht werden kann. 
-----------
Ibrahim
Kaypakkaya - Œuvres choisiesCette campagne
servira a financer la réimpression des œuvres choisies de Ibrahim
Kaypakkaya dans le but de les imprimer et de les publier sous forme
de livre.Pour imprimer ce livre, nous avons besoin d’un soutien
financier.Cette campagne n’est pas lucrative. Tous les revenus
de la vente de ce livre seront envoyés aux prisonniers politiques en
Turquie.
Informations
de fond
Fondateur du Parti
Communiste Turc / Marxiste-Léniniste et de l’
	
	
	
Armée
Ouvrière et Paysanne de Libération de la Turquie TIKKO.
Ibrahim Kaypakkaya a
fait parti des leaders du mouvement révolutionnaire en Turquie et a
marqué un changement dans le mouvement avec ses théories.En
contraste avec les autres révolutionnaire en 68 comme Deniz Gezmis
ou Mahir Cayan, il s’est distingué des autres révolutionnaires en
rejetant l’idéologie d’état – le kémalisme, en le déclarant
comme étant fasciste. Il s’est également distingué en
parlant de la situation des kurdes et à parler en faveur de leur
droit à l’auto-détermination.Ses thèses et ses œuvres
parlent et élaborent les problématiques révolutionnaires.Ses
prises de positions politiques étés et sont toujours considéré
comme dangereuses par l’Etat Turc qui en avait peur. Ibrahim
Kaypakkaya a donc été arrêté et longtemps torturé de sang-froid
jusqu’à la mort. La CIA considère les thèses de
Kaypakkaya (qui avait que 24 ans) comme les thèses politiques les
plus dangereuses de Turquie et de Moyen Orient.Ses écrits sont
interdits et les personnes qui les diffusent font face à des
condamnations draconiennes, souvent des emprisonnements à vie. Il
est par conséquent très dur de rendre ses écrits disponibles à un
large public. Ce projet est une chance pour publier ses œuvres en
langue allemande. Mais pour le faire, nous avons besoin d’un
soutien financier qui nous servira à imprimer ce livre.Contenu1.
Critique du Programme du TIIKP2. Critique Générale du
Révisionnisme de Safak3. Sur le Kémalisme4. La Question
Nationale en Turquie (Le Problème Kurde)
Nombre
et Faits
En premier le livre
sera traduit en allemand, puis une traduction française suivra. La
première édition du livre (Allemand/Français) sera tirée à 500
exemplaires. Apres épuisement, une autre édition sera également
tirée à 500 exemplaires.Le livre sera venu en ligne et en vente
directe.Le format du livre sera : A5, couverture souple en
couleur, papier 90g b/wL’objectif est d’imprimer et de
publier ce livre (Allemand) avant mai 2015.Pour
plus d’informations, suggestion, commande etc. veuillez contacter
l’adresse suivant : info@kaypakkaya.de - www.kaypakkaya.de
Aide
sans don
Tout le monde n’a
pas les possibilités de donner. Mais votre aide serait appréciée
si vous soutenez le projet en le diffusant sur Facebook, Twitter, par
mails etc. Cela permettrait d’atteindre un publique plus large.
Ibrahim
Kaypakkaya - Selected WorksThis
campaign wants to finance a reprint of the selected works Ibrahim
Kaypakkaya's and aims at printing and publishing them in book
form.For printing the book, we require financial support.This
is a non-profit-campaign. All of the proceeds from the sale of the
book will be donated to political prisoners in Turkey.
--------------------
Background
Information about Ibrahim Kaypakkaya
Founder of the Turkish
Communist Party/Marxist-Leninist and of the People's Liberation Army
TIKKO.
Ibrahim Kaypakka was
part of the leading personalities of  the revolutionary movement
in Turkey and marked a change in the movement with his theories. 
In contrast to other 68 revolutionaries like Deniz Gezmis and Mahir
Cayan, he distinguished himself from many other revolutionaries by
rejecting the state ideology of Kemalism and declaring it as fascism.
He was also the one who referred to the situation of the Kurdish
population and spoke up for their right to self-determination.His
theses and works focuse in detail on revolutionary questions and
elaborate them.His political views were and still are considered
dangerous by the Turkish state and therefore their distribution is
feared. So Ibrahim Kaypakakkaya was arrested and tortured to death
after a long period of coldblooded torture.The CIA classifies the
theses of the only 24 year old Kaypakkaya as the politically most
dangerous theses in Turkey and the Middle East.His writings are
banned and persons, who do distribute them, are going to face
draconian penalties, almost exclusively long-term-imprisonment.So
it's very difficult to make his writings accesible to a broad public.
The present project now gives us the chance to publish his writings
in German language. But for achieving this, we need financial
support, which we want to use to print this book.
Content
1. Criticism of the
TIIKP's Programm 2. General Criticism of the
Safak-Revisionism3. Views on Kemalism4. The National Question
in Turkey (The Kurdish Issue)
Information,
Numbers and Facts
At
first the book will be translated into German and will be followed by
its French translation. The first edition of the book (German/French)
will consist of 500 copies. When needed, the second edition will also
be printed with 500 copies.The book will be sold online
(www.kaypakkaya.de) and via direct sales.The book
format is: A5, coloured soft-cover, 90gr paper b/wThe aim is
to print and to publish the book (german version)  until May 2015. The french version will be translated and printed as soon as possible. For further
questions, suggestions, orders etc. please contact the following:
info@kaypakkaya.de - www.kaypakkaya.deSupport
Without DonationNot
everybody is able to donate. But we would be pleased if each of you
could support the project by spreading it via Facebook, Twitter,
E-Mail etc. So you will enable us to reach a broader public
----------------

Ibrahim
Kaypakkaya – Seçme Yazılar

Bu
kampanyanın hedefi, İbrahim Kaypakkaya’nın seçme yazılarının
başka dillere çevirilmesi ve kitap olarak basılması. Bu hedefe
ulasmak için ekonomik yardıma ihtiyacımız var. Kitap
satışlarından elde edilecek gelirin tamamı Türkiye’deki siyasi
tutsaklar için bağışlanacaktır.Kitabın Almanca tercümesi
Mayıs 2015'de basılıp, ardından Fransızca çevirisinin
çalışmalarına start verilecektir.Genel
Bilgiler
İbrahim
Kaypakkaya, Türkiye Komünist Partisi/Marksist-Leninist ve Türkiye
Işçi Köylü Kurtuluş Ordusu TIKKO’nun kurucusudur.

Ibrahim
Kaypakkaya Türkiye devrimci hareketinin önder kişiliklerinden biri
olarak tarihe geçmiş ve teorileri ile devrimci hareket içinde
hüküm süren paradigmanın başka bir yöne evrilmesini
saglamıştır. Onu 68 kuşagının diğer devrimci önderleri Mahir
Cayan ve Deniz Gezmiş’ten ayırt eden en belirgin nokta, Kemalizm
hakkında olan görüşleridir. Devrimci hareketin birçok mensubuna
karsın, “Kemalizm faşizmdir” diyerek Kemalist devlet
ideolojisini faşizm olarak tanımlayan Kaypakkaya, Kürt halkının
kendi kaderini tayin etme hakkını savunmuş ve bu konu hakkında
kapsamlı analizlerde bulunmuştur.

Ibrahim
Kaypakkaya’nın tezleri ve yazıları detaylı bir sekilde devrimci
sorunlara değinip bunların çözümünü amaçlıyor.

Türkiye
Devleti Kaypakkaya’nın görüşlerini tehlikeli olarak gördüğü
ve bunların yayılmasından korktuğu için, onu uzun süren ağır
bir iskenceden sonra katletmiştir. Hatta Amerikan istihbarat örgütü
CIA 24 yaşındaki Kaypakkaya’nın tezlerini Türkiye’nin politik
açıdan en tehlikeli tezleri olarak tanımlandırmıştır. Yazıları
bundan dolayı yasaklanmıştır ve onların yayılmasına yardımcı
olan kişiler hala ağır cezalar ile karşı karşıya kalıyorlar,
çoğu zaman uzun hapishane süreçleri.

Bundan
dolayı, Ibrahim Kaypakkaya’nın yazılarını geniş bir kitleye
ulaştırmak oldukça zor bir hale geliyor. Bu proje ile
amaçladığımız hedef ise, onun yazılarını Almanca ve
Fransızca dillerinde kitap halinde basıp, görüşlerinin daha çok
insan tarafından bilinmesini sağlamak.
Sayılar
ve Notlar

Kitabin
ilk basımı Almanca olacak ve ardından Fransızcaya çevirilip
basılacaktır. Birinci basım (Almanca, Fransızca) 500 adetten
oluşacaktır. Ikinci bir basıma ihtiyaç duyulduğunda, tekrar 
500 adet basılacaktır. Kitabı internet aracılığı ile
(www.kaypakkaya.de ) ve birebir gerçekleşecek satışlar ile satışa
çıkarmayı düşünüyoruz.

Kitap
A5 formatında basılacaktır. Amacımız, kitabı (öncelikle
Almanca versiyonunu) Mayıs 2015’in ortasına kadar basıp
yayımlamak. Fransızcası ardından yayımlanacak.
Sorularınız
varsa, görüş beyan etmek veya sipariş vermek istiyorsanız, bize
bu adreslerden ulaşabilirsiniz: info@kaypakkaya.de
- www.kaypakkaya.de
Bağış
Yapmadan Destek Olabilirsiniz

Tabii
ki herkes bağış yapacak güce sahip degil. Ancak hepimiz bu
projeye destek olabiriz. Facebook, Twitter, E-Mail vs. yardımıyla
bu projenin daha geniş bir kitleye ulaşmasını saglayabiliriz. Bu
konuda bize yardımcı olmanız, bizi projenin başarılı olabilmesi
açısından sevindirecektir.

story:
CHOCOLATE ARTE PROJECT: ART- EDUCATION-CULTURAL EXCHANGE

My Name is Laura Reiman, I am a visual artist and art teacher.

I started the Chocolate Arte project out of a concern for our awareness of the foods we eat and where they come from, and of course out of a personal love for chocolate and a growing interest for it's rich cultural history. The project consists of two parts that I am developing simultaneously: a growing portrait gallery of people from all over the world painted in pure chocolate (which is currently visible at the PepperMango in Amsterdam), and an art education program for children about the history of chocolate and cacao. In order to develop the art education program I need financial help, because it involves travelling, research, development of the program and materials and equipment have to be purchased.

Voor een Nederlandstalige uitleg van dit project bent u welkom op 

www.chocoweb.nl/steun-chocolate-arte-het-gezicht-van-chocolade/


WHY CHOCOLATE?

About two years ago a documentary on the chocolate industry showing African cocoa farmers who had never tasted chocolate in their life before shocked many people here in the Netherlands, including me: it showed how alienated we are from the foods we grow and consume. That same year I had visited Oaxaca, Mexico and I was impressed by the many ways in which cacao was an integral part of the traditional kitchen  and cultural celebrations. It has a complete different status and function in society than here in Europe, where it is mostly consumed as candy. Within this one food, cacao, there is so much history, so many different cultural uses, and at the same time so much ignorance still of it's origins and the current cultivation and productions methods used.

CHOCOLATE PORTRAITS

Being a visual artist, I wanted to find a way to show how cacao and chocolate are experienced by people in these three continents in such different ways. I also thought it would be fantastic if somehow they would be able to exchange this cultural knowledge with each other. So I came up with the idea to paint people from Latin America, Europe and Africa in chocolate and to assemble them all together in a growing collection of portraits, in an effort to 'visually reconnect' them, by making them all the same material and color: chocolate.

Making a visual statement is a good way to raise more awareness generally, but for me it is not doing enough so far. Since I am an art teacher and have experience working with children and designing educational programs I decided to also set up an exchange program through art workshops for children of the different continents, in which they learn about the cultural and historical aspects of chocolate and cocoa by investigating them in their own culture and sharing them with children of other countries. This way they investigate their own culture and learn about other cultures at the same time.

DEVELOPING AN ART EDUCATION PROGRAM  ABOUT THE  HISTORY OF CACAO FOR CHILDREN OF DIFFERENT CONTINENTS

The aim of this project is to set up an art education and cultural exchange program for children of Europe, Latin America and Africa, in which the children discover the history of chocolate and the many diffrent cultural uses through art and cooking workshops, by sending recipes back and forth and by learning about the origins of food, and about cultural traditions in relation to food.
In the end everything the children make and discover during the workshops will be documented and collected in an international art/cook book about chocolate.

 

WITH THIS CROWDFUND I AIM TO FINANCE THE FIRST PHASE OF THIS PROJECT

The first phase of this project will be the development of the art education program for children in Europe and Mexico. The second phase will include workshops in Ecuador and Africa, and presenting the children's investigations, recipes and art of the three continents in the book and a traveling exhibition, together with the chocolate portraits that I am painting during this project.

I plan to travel to Chiapas and Oaxaca Mexico first, to do research and to develop the education program working together with el Museo del Cacao in San Christóbal in Chiapas. 

Museo del Cacao y Chocolate, Chiapas Mexico

While there, I will also paint a series of portraits of the cacao farmers in chocolate. After that, I will travel to Oaxaca where most of Mexico's cacao is being consumed in many different dishes and drinks, in order to investigate the use of cacao in Oaxacan culture together with a group of children, through a series of art workshops. The children are aged between 6 and 12 and they are taken care of by the organisation "Hijos de la Luna". The families of these children can not take care of them mostly because of poverty, and the organisation is always in need of volunteers and teachers so I decided it would be a good thing to work with them and give them some extra support. They are also very enthusiastic about the project, so it promises to become a good and interesting collaboration. For more info on the organisation feel free to visit their website: 

http://www.hijosdelaluna-en.org/

After this I will share all the information resulting out of this workshops with a group of children from Amsterdam that I already work with as an art teacher and caregiver in the after school hours. The follow up will be a series of workshops with these children about the history of chocolate in Mexico and the history of chocolate here in Amsterdam, Europe, in order to share this again with the children of Mexico.


WHAT IS NEEDED FOR PHASE ONE

In order to develop the education program, do research and set up the connection between a group of children from Oaxaca and from Amsterdam I calculated that I need at least  €10.000, this will cover a time span of 6 months of research and development of the education program.

BY DONATING YOU HELP REALISE

  • the trip to Mexico, to investigate the history of cacao and develop an art education program suitable for children in different continents
  • Setting up the connection between a group of children from Amsterdam and a group of children from Mexico
  • Buy materials and multimedia equipment necessary for the art classes and intercontinental exchange like camera's, computers, but also cooking equipment and ingredients, paint, paper, clay, ink, canvas etc.
  • Pay local art teachers or cooks to give additional workshops if needed 

WHAT YOU GET

Everyone who donates will be listed in the art/cookbook we will eventually make as a contributor to the project.

For every donation of €100,- you will be painted in chocolate and become part of the traveling exhibition. 

For a donation of €500,- you will get a portrait painted in chocolate which will be sent to you.

THE IMPACT IT WILL MAKE

With this project I hope to raise a sense of awareness when it comes to cacao and chocolate, and actually to food en general; from the people who cultivate and grow the food, through it's processing and consumption. 

If in the and we manage to develop an education program about chocolate that can be applied by art teachers in all countries where chocolate plays a relevant role in the culture or economy, this would seriously be a valuable addition to de mainstream education programs, as it teaches children in a creative way about the origins of cacao and chocolate and it's uses in their own culture, and in others. This in turn, teaches children a general sense of awareness when it comes to food and it's origins and cultural context. They learn to see how food and culture are connected and they learn about other cultures in comparison to theirs. Also, they will learn to investigate history in a playful, creative way, skills that will help them develop a sense of curiosity and independence for the rest of their lives and last but not least: it will help them build and maintain a healthy and conscious relationship to the foods they consume, not only knowing where they come from, how they are grown and prepared, but also how to be creative with it themselves.

It will hopefully also make an impact by raising awareness of the sometimes challenging situations children are in in some countries and where necessary improve their economical conditions and changes of developing through education.

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

The history of cacao and chocolate will be explored through different art disciplines like drawing, writing, cooking, filming, music, animation, whatever suits the theme and the situation at that moment best.

Because the whole idea of the workshops is based on dialogue and exchange, a lot of the content and the outcome will be determined through the process itself. It will depend on the situation, on what is available in the direct environment and what the children's needs are at that moment. The idea is that they do not only learn about cacao and it's cultural history, but also language and communication skills, artistic expression, research skills, working together, presenting, sharing information, amongst other things. The workshops are set up to be a genuine art project working towards a real presentable book and exhibition, but at the same time they are designed to educate and share knowledge.

The big challenge in this first phase will be to get an exchange between children from different countries going in spite of the language barrier and sometimes also technological or logistical difficulties. We will have to see to what extend the information comes across and how we adapt ourselves and the content of the workshops so that it will. I do speak both Spanish and Dutch fluently so this will be a necessary help in translating certain things, but the idea is that the children feel like they are directly sharing things with each other.

Another challenge is the distance and the lack of physical contact which may be an obstacle in establishing a relationship.

Another challenge will be the local circumstances that one can never foresee a 100% and being able to be flexible enough to still follow up on the program while making certain adaptations when necessary.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Of course we need financial help with this project, but if you can help in any other form it is just as welcome: think of publicity, equipment, (also second hand camera's, computers, art materials), all is very welcome

The whole project can be followed on

facebook.com/chocolatepainting

chocolate-arte.tumblr.com

All chocolate portraits are painted with Chchukululu chocolate from Ecuador, sponsored by www.chocoweb.nl

chocolate-arte.tumblr.com
All chocolate portraits are painted with Chchukululu chocolate from Ecuador, sponsored by www.chocoweb.nl

story:
BACKGROUND

  1. Dharamshala is now home to approximately 15,000 additional Tibetans living in exile.
  2. Migrating communities and others were forced to leave their home, faced loneliness and isolation from family and friends, unemployment and a lack of economic opportunities, difficulty integrating, and the loss of cultural heritage.

TIBET WORLD where the Tibet meets the world and the world meets Tibet.

  1. Yeshi Lhundup founded Tibet World to help fellow Tibetans overcome the same challenges he faced.
  2. Platform for promoting education, raising cultural awareness, and imparting Tibetan values to the world.
  3. Meeting point for the Tibetan community and people from around the world.
  4. Tibet World gives Tibetan refugees the tools and strategies to address their own personal barriers and motivate themselves to get the most out of their life.

CHALLENGE

One of the primary challenges faced by Tibetans in exile is that many are unable to converse in international languages. Without conversational language skills, particularly in English, their attempts at integration and finding employment are more likely to fail.  Not having the language to promote and explain their way of life to non-Tibetan speakers also limits their ability to preserve their culture. 

VISION

Tibet World is a role model of a compassionate organization, committed to developing inner peace, self-reliance, and building a more harmonious world.

MISSION

Tibet World provides a platform for promoting education, raising cultural awareness and imparting Tibetan Buddhist values to the world by inspiring people to initiate compassion, harmony, and peace.

VALUE

Compassion: All actions of the organization must be carried out in the spirit of  compassion

Harmony: To unite all people in the world

 Peace:  We treat others as  we treat ourselves

ACHIEVEMENTS

  1. Provided education to more than 3000 students. We have been offering international language courses, various workshops, and training. 
  2. Enabled the participation of 1800 volunteers from 52 countries.
  3. Organized hundreds of different cultural events in which 5186 people have participated.
  4.  Created 10 full-time and 5 part-time jobs for local people in our organization.
  5. 214 school children have been benefited from Tibet World's Winter educational program.

CAMPAIGN

I have a voice

OBJECTIVE

Invest in Tibet future to give them a voice in the world.

STRATEGY

  1. Build up our own new premises - Tibet World campus to keep on working on addressing and solving urgent, social, cultural and educational problems for Tibetan refugees.
  2. 3000 square feet of land in an accessible location in or near McLeod Ganj.

REALITY

  1. Our major challenge is that we do not own our building and 60% of the Trust’s income is spent on rent.
  2. Renting is not sustainable. 

BENEFIT

  1. Sustainable for the long term.
  2. Become financially independent.
  3. Self-sustaining organization.

GOAL

  1. To provide better facilities for our students and Tibetan community.
  2. To improve the quality of our educational and cultural programs.
  3. To create more opportunities for our volunteers.
  4. To have a better designed and more extensive library for students, public and children’s.
  5. To create more secure employment opportunities inside and outside of Tibet World.
  6. To expand our cultural program.
  7. To keep on supporting the Central Tibetan Administration promoting – the well-being of Tibetan citizens.
  8. To create more financial and operational stability.

BUDGET

To buy land, and build up a Tibet World own home, the budget below is needed.

    What  You Can Do

    Four simple and quick ways to support us:

    1. To donate on "I have a voice  campaign" to increase our chances of reaching €215000
    2.  To encourage your friends and family to help us fundraise  
    3. Become a Campaign Ambassador to help promote this campaign -just 1 hour a week on social media (email us for more details)
    4. To share I have a voice  campaign  to your friends and family

story:
Less than a quarter of Balochistan’s residents live in urban areas. Most of the population lives in small and dispersed rural settlements– 5% of Pakistan’s population spread over 44% of its total land mass. As a result lack of access to basic services poses a tremendous challenge, particularly in education delivery. National Survey Statistics for Balochistan show only 47% of its children aged 5-9 are enrolled in school, with the figure for girls just 35%.

 

Lagging enrolments can be traced to low community participation, poor quality of education in government schools, and the limited participation of the private sector in education service delivery. This demands the promotion of public-private and community partnerships in order to improve access to quality primary education, especially for girls. 

 

Meet Asghar Khan

To counter the root cause of the destruction head-on, Asghar Khan, an Acumen Fellow initiated a campaign in 2013 to convince the people of tribal region to educate their children. The campaign led to the establishment of Dewa Foundation. DEWA is a non-profit, charitable educational foundation whose objective is to provide low cost quality education to the under privileged populous of tribal areas of Balochistan.

After completing his MBA in 2012, he had the option to have left his home town for a better future. However, an escapist approach was a sort of self-defeating zone for him. Those who were left behind were also his beloveds. Therefore, he decided to wage his own battle, a battle for peace and light.

Dewa Foundation Brief:

The program aims to increase access to quality educational facilities in far flung areas of Balochistan for disadvantaged groups of society. The interventions have been designed in light of Government of Pakistan’s Education Sector Reform (2001-11) which recognizes the role of Public Private Partnership for increased access, enhanced equity and improved quality at all levels of education. The project has targeted Asset-poor and vulnerable communities in the province.

Dewa Foundation aims to cater to a minimum of 1,500 direct beneficiaries comprising students, teachers, parents through the 20 rural based community supported schools by 2025. These schools will be established in partnership with local government bodies and private NGOs associations. The institutional strengthening interventions will focus on systematic development programs for educators and administrators, increase in professional development opportunities and incentives, clearly defined roles and responsibilities, and establishment of strong performance assessment systems. Moreover, the curriculum will be enriched for providing children and youth with educational facilities and exposure not merely to impact literacy skills but also to enhance their knowledge regarding varied development issues including health, road safety and life skills.

The realization of Dewa Foundation’s objectives will also heavily rely on strengthening institutional and managerial capacities and competence at levels. This will require substantial human, financial and technical resources and a long-term perspective. The lack of institutional capacity and poor quality of education must be tackled by providing systematic staff development program, increase in professional opportunities and incentives, clearly defined roles and responsibilities, and establishment of strong assessment systems for performance. 

By focusing on critical aspects of institutional development and quality advancement, Dewa Foundation will provide necessary support and facilitation to schools in this regard. Support offered to schools will include training and capacity building for teachers, school heads and in areas of child centered learning, school management, school development planning and parental and community involvement. 

 

Our Journey

The campaign established three schools in far flung areas of Balochistan, Marghazakaryazai campus in 2014, Khanozai Campus in 2016 and Village Churmian campus in 2017. Today total number of students in all three campuses are 268, out of which 191 (71%) are boys and 77 are girls (29%). In order to promote women empowerment and reduce poverty, the foundation employed 22 female teachers, 2 watchmen, one male and one female canteen contractors in all campuses. The education system also equally addresses the co-curricular development of its students. To that end, Dewa schools successfully organized cricket, volleyball and football tournaments. The youth of district Pishin actively participated in these events, the reason behind these events was that we believe such events can reduce extremist trends among children and youth.

Our Objectives

The objective of Dewa Foundation is to

  • Promote and extend quality education in rural and deprived areas of Balochistan by opening standard educational institutions
  • Reduce Poverty by providing employment opportunities at grass root level
  • Encourage female teachers for teaching in private schools
  • Launch meaningful research projects to build the models for low-cost and high quality institutions of learning, increasing access to primary education through establishment of rural based community schools
  • Facilitate at least 1200 students to attain class 5 competencies through non-formal/informal approaches by 2020.
  • Train at least 50 locally hired teachers for pedagogical and subject based excellence
  • Establish and train 20 parent management bodies for school management; administration, and supervision;
  • Design need based and locally relevant educational content for literacy, numeracy and life skills.
  • Generate character building through education and training. 
  • Involve and mobilize the community for the noble cause of education
  • Recognize the teaching profession as respectable profession in the society.

 

The Innovative Idea

Promoting education in this part of the world is itself a novel idea for the masses. To work for any change is a challenge in the region. Dewa achieves its objectives through working on ideas that affectively convinces the masses. Dewa attracts female enrollments in the schools by employing female faculty in its schools. Employing female faculty has been a challenge, however, the foundation has successfully engaged the rare enlightened families in the region who lets their educated women to work.

 

Dewa’s bamboo and mud structures are themselves unique in the region which is cost-effective, weather and earthquake resistant.

 

Dewa foundation works to sustain the low-cost education in the rural areas by its schools in the urban centers through its idea called joycation. Under the joycation, the relatively higher tuition fee in the urban cities is used to sustain the Dewa schools in the rural and tribal areas.

 

Salient features of Dewa Foundation Schools

Initially One class, one teacher, simple but gradual progress.

 

  • Urdu + English as a medium of instruction.
  • Regular monthly tests for higher classes.
  • Special emphasis on English and Arabic.
  • Character building as a part of syllabus.
  • Central examination system.
  • Competent and hard working teachers.
  • Proper guidance for co-curricular activities.
  • Same curriculum and scheme of study for all school.
  • Regular moral and professional training for teachers.
  • Generous offer for needy and orphan students.
  • Maximum honor, dignity and job security for teachers.
  • Nationwide harmony of curriculum, examination and staff development.

 

Activities / Interventions

 

  • Strengthening of village education committees in existing structure of community schools
  • Classroom support to teachers in different subjects
  • Monthly monitoring visits
  • Teachers appointment as per need of community
  • Increased girls enrollment in school
  • Integrated education, art and other lifelong skills in education
  • Increase parents participation through social mobilization and community participation
  • Infrastructure support to schools
  • Rehabilitation of school wash facilities

 

 

Unfortunately, DEWA foundation is constrained in ways that hinder the full impact it can make in the communities.

 

Firstly, in order to achieve the fully facilitate the female teachers employed in the premises, it is looking to initiate a transportation service for these employees.

 

Secondly, the biggest challenge for any non-profit organization has to be the shortage of funds. The young enthusiasts of DEWA foundation are working hard on collecting the donations so the cause never stops. As the children (with scholarship ratio 30:70) in the DEWA foundation schools are studying free of cost, the money donated can never be enough. So, here is an appeal to all the people out there to donate as much as you can so this noble cause doesn't end here.

We are hence, earnestly requesting you to contribute wholeheartedly to the campaign to allow us to continue our endeavors at full steam and make a dent in the education sphere in Balochistan.

story:
In 2017, I started to learn and apply new principles about the mind which led to a quantum leap in my performance. I played higher in the line-up of my team and won more as matches well (see table above).

What is the Next Generation of Sports Performance? 

This online course helps athletes develop their minds to unlock their full potential in competition. Many athletes agree that mindset is one of the most important skills but don’t know how to apply it. The information in this course gives clarity and practical tools to transform athletes into consistent peak-performers who win more! It consists of the best information I've learned over the years to deal with pressure, (unconscious) mental blocks, improve confidence, optimal focus, and to build a completely new perspective.

Lay-Out and How it works 

Introduction 

Module 1: Learning how to learn

Module 2: Correlation of State of Mind and Performance: Building Belief

Module 3: Taking Charge: Responding vs Reacting  

Module 4: New Empowering Perspective: Why you play sports

Module 5: Shifting Context: Mental Toughness

Module 6: Master (Negative) Emotions

Module 7: Power of Identity and Getting into The Zone

Module 8: Visualizing: Communicating with the Body

Module 9: Competition: Overcoming Fears/Pressure

Module 10: Practice to Compete

Module 11: Guarantee Success: Implementation

This is an interactive video course divided into modules (see above) with a workbook and exercises that athletes apply to get results. The members get access to an online community where they can help, connect, and share their progress with each other. I will be answering questions personally and provide coaching. 

Rewards for You!

By contributing, you will get access to my online course and I offer private coaching session(s) (based on your contribution) to help create a big transformation in your sport or life! My specialty is working with athletes but I also have a lot of experience in life-coaching. If you're not an athlete, then I am excited to offer coaching to help make an empowering shift in your life!

Why 5000 EUR? 

I try to personally fund as much as I can but I need extra help. My goal is to help as many athletes in the best possible way. I will be investing in the following things: Business coaching sessions that specialize in creating and marketing online courses, marketing advertisement, video recording materials, and video course platform. 

You can help and be part of this by donating and spreading the word with others. I will keep you updated on the progress! Thank you for supporting. It means a lot to me:)

story:
About Our Founder

Charles A. Lowman is an educator, blogger and broadcaster from Houston, Texas who currently resides in the Dominican Republic. For over 15 years, Mr. Lowman taught middle and high school science and math at schools in Michigan and Texas and to students across the US in online academic enrichment and tutoring sessions.

A tireless advocate for youth empowerment and developing future leaders, Mr. Lowman has mentored youth advocating for social, political and environmental concerns, as well as for promoting alternative energy and sustainable community development.

Always with his finger on the pulse of innovations in education technology and trends in mass media, Mr. Lowman has trained youth in aquaponics, robotics, print and broadcast media production, computer graphics and web design.

Why Aprende 24? 

The right to a quality education that enables individuals to provide sustenance and participate fully as productive members of society, is a right that is honored by most governments around the globe. 

However, the reality in the Dominican Republic is that despite recent gains in spending on public education and other reforms, a large sector of the population still does not have access to the quality of education and/or the proper tools and supplemental content that are essential for academic success.

A high quality education is the proverbial key that opens the doors of opportunity and prosperity. Research findings consistently show a direct correlation between inadequate education levels and political, economic and social marginalization. These conditions offer little hope of escape from the cycle of poverty or for attaining self-sufficiency.

English Language Training  Record growth in the telemarketing, phone support services and tourism industries, has made English language proficiency essential for top employment and entrepreneurial opportunities in the Dominican Republic. A recent government study found that lacking English proficiency resulted in a 60% loss in salary and gratuities for the same job position. Most people either can't afford tuition and travel expenses to attend English classes at a local language center or cannot commit to classes that may be scheduled at times that are inconvenient or unsafe for traveling to at night. Aprende 24  will offer free self-guided English courses through its streaming channel. For an affordable monthly fee, teacher-guided online classroom courses will be offered through its on-demand channel.

Culture & Society Learning Much of what is available in the local broadcast media in the Dominican Republic, does not reflect, represent nor appeal to the racial, ethnic and class realities of the vast majority of its citizens. We feel that it is imperative that people, (especially impressionable youth) see themselves in the media as more than entertainers, athletes, and victims or perpetrators of illegal activities and violence. The studio of Aprende 24  will be a place where young educators, activists and artists can collaborate to create socially-conscientious and empowering video content for distribution to the general public and school classrooms over the Aprende 24 network. 

Science & STEM Learning  More than 90% of schools in the Dominican Republic do not have science labs or facilities for scientific demonstrations and practical experiments. In Phase II of its development, Aprende 24  will expand its operations to include a studio set that will facilitate the production of supplemental science education content to subscribers. This content will be aligned to the national school curriculum as stipulated by MINERD, the government's education authority. Guest teachers and students from local schools will be invited to our video-recording studio to conduct science experiments and demonstrations. During the post-production process, animation, interactive simulations as well as related video content will be added to complement in-studio video footage. Subscription service for this content will be open to educators and/or family households. Subscribers will log into the Aprende 24  science channel and have on-demand access to episodes that correspond with their specific lesson plan. Review and assessment resources will be provided to teachers to download and utilize in their classrooms. In the lead up to launching the Phase II supplemental science initiative, Aprende 24  will engage students with a weekly STEM-based broadcast program.

What We Need

Aprende 24  is seeking to raise funds in the amount of $19,450 for the successful launch of Phase I of this educational initiative. Following is a summary breakdown of where the funds will be spent:

IMPORTANT NOTICE: If we do not  reach our fund-raising goal, we will scale back our        Phase I operations in the following manner:

  • Utilize a much less expensive HD webcam instead of the Sony HD camcorder 
  • Scale back studio costs by utilizing an extra room in the residence rather than a separate building/office location
  • Forego streaming of free English language proficiency courses and opt for paid on-demand streaming access for self-study students and for students enrolled in teacher-led online courses 

The Impact

Aprende 24  has met with management at several local cable television stations. While these stations were excited about our initiative and offered access to professional studio space and equipment, broadcasting costs and scheduling slots offered to our program made terrestrial television a nonviable option. For this reason we turned to the WebTV concept. By developing our own network and streaming online, we can reach a much larger audience and empower under-served and disadvantaged students anywhere on the island where they have Internet access.

Any new venture must quickly establish it's worth in a tangible way. Because it literally can be the difference between landing a job or not getting hired, English proficiency is a highly-sought after marketable skill. This is precisely why we chose to focus initially on creative ways to bring English language education to a wide audience of students. However English is only the beginning. We're also excited about the potential for Aprende 24  to take the lead on future initiatives as well. Once we have established a successful track record of engaging students, teachers and parents and building a loyal audience, we foresee our ability to expand our reach into school campuses and the community with initiatives such as: 

  • Inspiring youth to produce media and inviting them to become content providers and Aprende 24  broadcast partners
  • Motivating youth to strive for academic excellence by conducting science fair competitions, scholastic tournaments, STEM contests, spelling bees and art exhibits and covering all of these events on the Aprende 24  network
  • Developing character and raising self-esteem by recognizing student performance in the classroom and in their communities on the Aprende 24  broadcast network

Risks & Challenges

Aprende 24  will have to develop multiple income streams to sustain operations. The four primary income sources will be:

  1. Advertising
  2. Student Fees & Tuition
  3. Subscriptions for On-Demand Access
  4. Broadcast Content Providers/Partners

Advertising Generating advertising accounts will be a bigger challenge than normal because of cultural abnormalities. In the Dominican Republic, corporations and business owners generally do not see the value in associating their brand with education or youth activities. We will strive to reverse this mindset by giving much visibility to our initial advertisers and sponsors with in-stream commercials, on our mobile application, on our website and during our interviews on local television and radio programs.

Student Fees & Tuition Let's face it, most students are simply not disciplined enough for self-guided/self-study courses. Therefore, we're confident that once they see the free English language classes on the free-access streaming channel, many students will see the value of enrolling in a teacher-led class with other students. Our aggressive social media marketing campaign will focus more so on the added benefits of the paid course over the free self-study option.

Subscriptions for On-Demand Access Although this is primarily an option for the Phase II supplemental science and STEM learning initiative, once the program schedule of the free-access streaming channel begins to fill with programs from content provider/partners, we will offer a subscription plan for on-demand access to the English language courses for self-study students. 

Broadcast Content Providers/Partners  We will solicit and review content from individuals or groups for possible broadcast over the Aprende24  network. Provided that the content meets our guidelines and the required advance broadcasting fee has been secured, monthly, 3 month. semiannual or annual contracts will be drawn up and notarized by our legal representative. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We certainly understand if you can not donate funds to this campaign at this time. However if you believe that our effort deserves your support, please consider helping our cause in the following manner:

  • Your family and friends trust your judgement and opinion. Help us spread the word about our campaign by using the Indiegogo share tools.
  • Talk about our campaign with friends or co-workers, or members at your place of worship. Encourage them to support us.
story_txt:
About Our Founder
Charles A. Lowman is an educator, blogger and broadcaster from Houston, Texas who currently resides in the Dominican Republic. For over 15 years, Mr. Lowman taught middle and high school science and math at schools in Michigan and Texas and to students across the US in online academic enrichment and tutoring sessions.
A tireless advocate for youth empowerment and developing future leaders, Mr. Lowman has mentored youth advocating for social, political and environmental concerns, as well as for promoting alternative energy and sustainable community development.
Always with his finger on the pulse of innovations in education technology and trends in mass media, Mr. Lowman has trained youth in aquaponics, robotics, print and broadcast media production, computer graphics and web design.
Why Aprende 24? 
The right to a quality education that enables individuals to provide sustenance and participate fully as productive members of society, is a right that is honored by most governments around the globe. 
However, the reality in the Dominican Republic is that despite recent gains in spending on public education and other reforms, a large sector of the population still does not have access to the quality of education and/or the proper tools and supplemental content that are essential for academic success.
A high quality education is the proverbial key that opens the doors of opportunity and prosperity. Research findings consistently show a direct correlation between inadequate education levels and political, economic and social marginalization. These conditions offer little hope of escape from the cycle of poverty or for attaining self-sufficiency.
English Language Training  Record growth in the telemarketing, phone support services and tourism industries, has made English language proficiency essential for top employment and entrepreneurial opportunities in the Dominican Republic. A recent government study found that lacking English proficiency resulted in a 60% loss in salary and gratuities for the same job position. Most people either can't afford tuition and travel expenses to attend English classes at a local language center or cannot commit to classes that may be scheduled at times that are inconvenient or unsafe for traveling to at night. Aprende 24  will offer free self-guided English courses through its streaming channel. For an affordable monthly fee, teacher-guided online classroom courses will be offered through its on-demand channel.
Culture & Society Learning Much of what is available in the local broadcast media in the Dominican Republic, does not reflect, represent nor appeal to the racial, ethnic and class realities of the vast majority of its citizens. We feel that it is imperative that people, (especially impressionable youth) see themselves in the media as more than entertainers, athletes, and victims or perpetrators of illegal activities and violence. The studio of Aprende 24  will be a place where young educators, activists and artists can collaborate to create socially-conscientious and empowering video content for distribution to the general public and school classrooms over the Aprende 24 network. 
Science & STEM Learning  More than 90% of schools in the Dominican Republic do not have science labs or facilities for scientific demonstrations and practical experiments. In Phase II of its development, Aprende 24  will expand its operations to include a studio set that will facilitate the production of supplemental science education content to subscribers. This content will be aligned to the national school curriculum as stipulated by MINERD, the government's education authority. Guest teachers and students from local schools will be invited to our video-recording studio to conduct science experiments and demonstrations. During the post-production process, animation, interactive simulations as well as related video content will be added to complement in-studio video footage. Subscription service for this content will be open to educators and/or family households. Subscribers will log into the Aprende 24  science channel and have on-demand access to episodes that correspond with their specific lesson plan. Review and assessment resources will be provided to teachers to download and utilize in their classrooms. In the lead up to launching the Phase II supplemental science initiative, Aprende 24  will engage students with a weekly STEM-based broadcast program.

What We Need
Aprende 24  is seeking to raise funds in the amount of $19,450 for the successful launch of Phase I of this educational initiative. Following is a summary breakdown of where the funds will be spent:

IMPORTANT NOTICE: If we do not  reach our fund-raising goal, we will scale back our        Phase I operations in the following manner:

Utilize a much less expensive HD webcam instead of the Sony HD camcorder 
Scale back studio costs by utilizing an extra room in the residence rather than a separate building/office location
Forego streaming of free English language proficiency courses and opt for paid on-demand streaming access for self-study students and for students enrolled in teacher-led online courses 


The Impact
Aprende 24  has met with management at several local cable television stations. While these stations were excited about our initiative and offered access to professional studio space and equipment, broadcasting costs and scheduling slots offered to our program made terrestrial television a nonviable option. For this reason we turned to the WebTV concept. By developing our own network and streaming online, we can reach a much larger audience and empower under-served and disadvantaged students anywhere on the island where they have Internet access.
Any new venture must quickly establish it's worth in a tangible way. Because it literally can be the difference between landing a job or not getting hired, English proficiency is a highly-sought after marketable skill. This is precisely why we chose to focus initially on creative ways to bring English language education to a wide audience of students. However English is only the beginning. We're also excited about the potential for Aprende 24  to take the lead on future initiatives as well. Once we have established a successful track record of engaging students, teachers and parents and building a loyal audience, we foresee our ability to expand our reach into school campuses and the community with initiatives such as: 

Inspiring youth to produce media and inviting them to become content providers and Aprende 24  broadcast partners
Motivating youth to strive for academic excellence by conducting science fair competitions, scholastic tournaments, STEM contests, spelling bees and art exhibits and covering all of these events on the Aprende 24  network
Developing character and raising self-esteem by recognizing student performance in the classroom and in their communities on the Aprende 24  broadcast network


Risks & Challenges
Aprende 24  will have to develop multiple income streams to sustain operations. The four primary income sources will be:

Advertising
Student Fees & Tuition
Subscriptions for On-Demand Access
Broadcast Content Providers/Partners

Advertising Generating advertising accounts will be a bigger challenge than normal because of cultural abnormalities. In the Dominican Republic, corporations and business owners generally do not see the value in associating their brand with education or youth activities. We will strive to reverse this mindset by giving much visibility to our initial advertisers and sponsors with in-stream commercials, on our mobile application, on our website and during our interviews on local television and radio programs.
Student Fees & Tuition Let's face it, most students are simply not disciplined enough for self-guided/self-study courses. Therefore, we're confident that once they see the free English language classes on the free-access streaming channel, many students will see the value of enrolling in a teacher-led class with other students. Our aggressive social media marketing campaign will focus more so on the added benefits of the paid course over the free self-study option.
Subscriptions for On-Demand Access Although this is primarily an option for the Phase II supplemental science and STEM learning initiative, once the program schedule of the free-access streaming channel begins to fill with programs from content provider/partners, we will offer a subscription plan for on-demand access to the English language courses for self-study students. 
Broadcast Content Providers/Partners  We will solicit and review content from individuals or groups for possible broadcast over the Aprende24  network. Provided that the content meets our guidelines and the required advance broadcasting fee has been secured, monthly, 3 month. semiannual or annual contracts will be drawn up and notarized by our legal representative. 
Other Ways You Can Help
We certainly understand if you can not donate funds to this campaign at this time. However if you believe that our effort deserves your support, please consider helping our cause in the following manner:

Your family and friends trust your judgement and opinion. Help us spread the word about our campaign by using the Indiegogo share tools.
Talk about our campaign with friends or co-workers, or members at your place of worship. Encourage them to support us.

story:
Hello! Some of you reading this are family, some of you are friends, and some of you may be strangers. Regardless of how you know me, I am happy you are taking the time to look at my Indie-GoGo!

I was recently accepted to a study abroad program in Japan, something I have been waiting on for a very long time. I am elated! One of the roadblocks I have to overcome before travelling, however, is paying for the plane ticket. Tickets to Japan run anywhere from $1,500-$3,000, and unfortunately I don't have that right now. Anything helps, so if you are able to contribute, I would greatly appreciate it!

Your investment will go a long way in helping me achieve my academic goals, and will help me gain real world experience pertaining to my major!

story:
Hi everybody! My name is Julia Fournier and I want to become a director!

 I am also an actress, now I feel the pulse to become a director and tell my own stories. I spent one year living in Colorado, USA, I am from Spain. And I fell in love with the place. I found this great school COLORADO FILM SCHOOL.

http://coloradofilmschool.co/_/acting-directing/

And it is a shame but I cannot afford the NON-RESIDENT TUITION. That is why I am asking for help. I want to study ACTING/DIRECTING there in the next two years. 

What I would love to do in the future and I am trying to do it now... with little resources, is create stories that make feel something to the audience, anything. Documentaries, short films, feature films... I feel really concerned about social issues. Like homelessness, social inequalities, people with special needs, immigration, health care, global warming, etc. I like sharing important information that concerns all of us. 

 

WHAT DO YOU OBTAIN?

A part of making me reeeeally happy... wake up other people's minds. That is what I want to reach with my work. This is an amazing life and we have to enjoy it.

If I reach the goal the hundred percent 15000$ would go to:

- 13,900$ - COLORADO FILM SCHOOL YEAR 2017/2018.

- 1100$ - Health insurance.

I am going to be working now and I hope I can earn enough money to pay my expenses and housing! :D

If I do not get the goal, I want to be able to do it any way. So I would use it for the same thing. 

WHAT DO I WANT TO DO?

I want to use this experience to create a network and contact with people with the same interests as me and together tell these stories to the world. I want to learn the cinema technic. I am a really intuitive person. But I need more tools to know what to do and how.

 WHAT HAVE I DONE TILL NOW?

www.juliafournier.com

This is my website where you can find all my work till now. I also made some stuff with no resources.

 https://vimeo.com/128984824 

I made this short film after a trip to India that made me change all my mind about the idea I had about the world.
 
Thank you so much for your support and I would really appreciate if you share this. 
MILLION THANKS!
MIL GRACIAS A TODXS!

story:
The Story of Math Stackers

Have you ever seen a child’s face when the lightbulb comes on? When they discover something new and are alive with excitement! That is what Math Stackers is all about. Math Stackers is a toy designed for kids to explore, create, and express mathematically all through FUN active play!

 

As a former middle and elementary school math teacher, I can tell you that I lived for those moments. I knew the dreams my students and their parents had for their future: aspirations of space exploration, finding a cure for cancer, finding justice in a courtroom, performing for and inspiring the masses through creative art forms or athletics, and of course educating the next generation.

Because of my love and study of math, I know the power of critical mathematical thinking and how it can revolutionize how we approach not only learning but also our daily decisions and how we persist to reach our goals for the future. Math, with all of its beautiful interrelatedness, teaches us to break down situations, identify a problem and then reconstruct to find a solution; a powerful skill that has provided the solutions and cures of all of our modern advances.

But when do we begin to introduce this type of thinking to our children, and how do we capture and harness the excitement of discovery to propel a love of math for the rest of their life? These were the questions and aspirations that we made our focus and inspiration as we designed and developed Math Stackers. Our ultimate goal is to inspire a generation to fall in love with math.

 

So how do we Inspire?

Math Stackers is a hands-on TOY that imitates the nature of a number line, where the height of the blocks represents each number’s value.

Because of this, as your child imagines and builds, they are seeing math in action as early as 3 years old! As they stack and restack to construct the perfect fort to ward off an enemy invasion, they are physically seeing and discovering the relationships found in math.

The walls of their creation not only express your child’s creativity but also the power of addition and subtraction, multiplication, measurement, and algebraic thinking. They problem solve and substitute equivalent combinations of Math Stackers to refine the construction and look of their crafted structure, but through their eyes, it is just play and thinking through the creative process.

 

Why are we crowdfunding?

Through this campaign we are offering a new gift or starter set of 27 Math Stackers. We have had many requests for a smaller sized set to use as an introduction to mathematical free play or to be given as the ultimate educational birthday, holiday, or “just because” gift to all of the children in your life. Since our goal is to inspire as many kids as possible to fall in love with math, we are happy to meet this need.  Why indiegogo? Your support will enable us to scale our manufacturing process to make this possible.

Currently, Math Stackers offers two versions of a full-set of 96 Math Stackers that are catered towards in-depth early learning and elementary level mathematics discovery.

 

Why is Math Stackers a game changer?

We believe math is the ultimate gateway to achieving dreams and that anyone can learn math. Your contribution is starting a child on a life-long journey to not only understand mathematics in a concrete and pragmatic way, but also to enjoy and practice mathematical thinking. All of our technological developments and scientific breakthroughs are related directly to math. Now envision a generation of kids not only passionate about but excelling in the field of mathematics - we’re opening the door for them to change the world as we know it.

 

What we are offering

Gift Set

Estimated Delivery May 2018
*We are also offering a limited amount of starter sets to be delivered before Christmas.

Begin fun, mathematical discovery early with our starter set of 27 Math Stackers! Hours of fun as your child plays, builds and sees mathematical concepts in action. Each set includes the following:
Ten 1-blocks
Two 2-blocks
Two 3-blocks
Two 4-blocks
Two 5-blocks
Two 6-blocks
Two 7-blocks
Two 8-blocks
Two 9-blocks
One 10-block

 

Double Gift Set

Estimated Delivery May 2018
Includes free shipping, both sets will be delivered to one address.

Now your child can build it bigger and stack it higher with two of our starter sets, 54 Math Stackers! Build more, discover more with 54 blocks OR keep one and give one to share the fun!

 

Early Learning Set

Estimated Delivery May 2018

Take your early math investigation to the next level and let the creativity flow with 96 Math Stackers! A great opportunity to pre-order this set at a discount for the learning needs of your preschooler (targeted for ages 3 through 6). This set is designed to be used with 1 to 6 kids at a time and is used in homes and schools.

Includes:

96 Math Stackers for extreme creative building, the Early Learning Book filled with active games and explorations, and the portable Math Stackers tote for easy storage and mobility.

Our Early Learning Book includes 20 different games and activities used to explore:
Patterns
1-1 correspondence
Comparing and Ordering Numbers
Counting
Measurement
Spatial Reasoning

 

Elementary Set

Estimated Delivery May 2018

Unlock all the possibilities with our Elementary Set of Math Stackers. Firmly grasp mathematical concepts and include tons of mathematical ideas in your uber mathemagical structures! Pre-order this set at a discount for your elementary student (targeted for grades K through 5th). This set is designed to be used with 1 to 6 kids at a time and is used in homes and schools.

Includes:

96 Math Stackers for extreme creative building, the Discovery Guide, which includes 28 investigative levels and challenges, and the portable Math Stackers tote for easy storage and mobility.

Our Discovery Guide, with embedded augmented reality, includes 28 different levels and activities used to explore:
Addition
Subtraction
Multiplication
Fractions
Adding Fractions

View the Discover Guide Overview to get a more detailed list of content included

 

4 Early Learning Sets

Big savings when you pre-order 4 of our Early Education Sets. A great way to equip the educators in your child’s life with Math Stackers. Be the one who starts a generation of kids on a journey to fall in love with math! (targeted for ages 3 through 6)

 

4 Elementary Sets

Big savings when you pre-order 4 of our Elementary Sets. A great way to equip the educators in your child’s life with Math Stackers. Be the one who starts a generation of kids on a journey to fall in love with math! (targeted for grades K through 5)

 

Spread the word and get a freebie!

We need your help! Word of mouth is the BEST way to spread the word and let your friends and family know about this limited opportunity to pre-order Math Stackers.

And we want to thank you for doing so by giving you a FREEBIE when you follow these three steps:

STEP 1: Share

Share our Indiegogo campaign on Facebook, Twitter or Instagram

STEP 2: Sign Up 

Sign up for our email subscription and confirm so we can send you the freebie!

STEP 3: Receive

After the campaign ends, we will email a link with two FREE paper Math Stackers downloads.

Make your child’s day by printing and giving them colorful, paper Math Stackers to arrange and design a picture of their choosing OR let them color their own Math Stackers to use to create any mathemagical world they imagine! When their world is complete, share it with us on our Facebook and Instagram pages! (@mathstackers)

 

Timeline

Your contribution

Your generous contribution is funding our vision to get Math Stackers into the hands of preschool and elementary school aged children so that they too can start their journey and fall in love with math!

Team

Kelly
President, Creator and Persistent Problem Solver

Sarah
Website and Digital Extraordinaire

Katie
Empress of Communication
